name: Sully.ai
headline: AI Medical Employees for Healthcare
description:
Our Mission: "One Human, One Doctor".
Why? Because access to a doctor is a basic human right.

Customer: 
Healthcare Organizations

Product: 
All-in-one solution to save doctors time. 

Problem: 
Doctors spend 50% of their time on things other than patient care, and the other 50% is inefficient. 

Solution: 
All-in-one solution for doctors that saves time from pre, post, and during-visit. 

Opportunity: 
Over 1 Billion visits patient care visits occur in the US annually, and the current average cost per visit is $300. When future visits are done by an ASI (Artificial Super Intelligence) doctor at a 10x cheaper cost ($29 per visit), it’s $3.9B in revenue in the US only and $25B+ globally.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:health-tech; industry:b2b; industry:healthcare; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Ahmed Omar, Founder
founders.description: At 13, Omar started selling online and started MMA (Mixed Martial Arts) fighting, becoming the #1 fighter in Egypt (holding 3x gold medals); he quickly realized he was more passionate about tech. In 2014, he fled to NYC and built a brand from $0 to $55M in e-commerce sales in 3.5 years, ranking #1 in Amazon placement for certain sizes. In 2019, he headed back to Egypt and met Nasser, and together, they built the #1 car parts marketplace, acquiring over 55% market share.

founders.name: Ahmed Nasser, Founder
founders.description: He invented a math formula in high school, studied computer science, and corrected his professors' code. Still, his passion grew towards sales and marketing, so he worked in healthcare early on and was a top sales performer from over 500 sales & marketing representatives selling medical products to US customers. In 2019, Nasser took the startup from $0 to $14M (RR) in sales in 22 months to the highest-ever auto-marketplace sales in the region.

generated_description:
**Sully.ai** is a promising startup that launched in 2023, nestled in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco. With a mission that resonates deeply—"One Human, One Doctor"—Sully.ai is on a mission to ensure that access to medical care is seen as a fundamental human right.

### What’s the Problem?

Healthcare is an essential part of our lives, yet it is riddled with inefficiencies. Doctors reportedly spend **50% of their time** attending to administrative tasks, leaving only half of their day for actual patient care. This inefficiency not only hampers healthcare quality but also contributes to soaring operational costs. It's worth noting that salaries represent a staggering **$800 billion** in annual spending by U.S. healthcare organizations—that's a big chunk of change wasted!

### The Big Idea

Enter *Sully.ai's* solution—a comprehensive AI-driven platform designed specifically to save doctors time before, during, and after patient consultations. The core product is an **all-in-one solution** tailored to enhance physician productivity, allowing them to focus on patient care instead of paperwork.

### Target Market

The primary customer base for Sully.ai is **healthcare organizations**. With an annual total of over **1 billion patient visits** in the U.S. alone and the average visit costing **$300**, the market potential is enormous. If Sully.ai's Artificial Super Intelligence (ASI) doctors can lower these costs to about **$29 per visit**, that translates to **$3.9 billion** in revenue just within the U.S., with a global market projection exceeding **$25 billion**.

### Features and Offerings 

Sully.ai offers a range of **AI agents** that handle various tasks, including:

- **Medical Assistant:** Supports clinical procedures.
- **Scribe Agent:** Generates notes from doctor-patient conversations.
- **Receptionist Agent:** Manages patient appointments.
- **Nurse Agent:** Coordinates patient care.
- **Pharmacy Technician:** Procures medication orders.
- **Medical Coder:** Assigns the correct billing codes.
  
What’s compelling about these AI agents is their ability to integrate seamlessly into existing healthcare systems, making the transition smooth for healthcare providers.

### Backing and Growth

The company is part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, a testament to the promise they hold in reshaping healthcare delivery. Led by a team of **12 talented employees**, and mentored by notable figures like **Michael Seibel**, Sully.ai has hit the ground running.

### Looking Ahead

As the landscape of healthcare continues to evolve, Sully.ai stands at the forefront, leveraging cutting-edge technology to drive efficiency and ensure that doctors can dedicate their time to what truly matters—patient care. It's not just about saving time; it's about transforming the way we think about healthcare delivery.

Check them out at [Sully.ai](https://www.sully.ai) for more insights on how they plan to revolutionize patient care through AI.
